pages.text: Firon Armor protects the wearer from high temperatures, and is also capable of instantly removing a fire outside of the ignition source in a complete set.$(br)While fully equipped, sneak after the jump to deal damage and ignite entities nearby!

Can be crafted on Lithum Altar, using $(#ea7f17)$(l)200 000 DE$() and following items:$(li)Netherite Helmet$(o) [Main]$()$(li)Firon Ingot $(o)[x4]$()$(br2)Recovery after full ritual: $(#992032)$(l)2000 DRP$()$(br2)Firon Helmet improves vision in the lava when equipped.
